name: Super Fly 3D World
description:
SUPER FLY 3D WORLD

Welcome to a new planet of Super FlyStar Galaxy, the Super Fly 3D World! Well, it makes a lot of words for just one 3D Platformer level inspired by Mario 3D Land/World games. 

In this short adventure, your goal is to find a  Super Sunshine. You can climb this platform mountain and beat the boss, or find the secret one.  

Control ActionKeyboard inputsXbox gamepad inputsMoveWASD / up-arrow, down-arrowLeft joystickJumpSpaceACameraMouse / right-arrow, left-arrowRight joystickPauseXSTARTShrinkLeft CTRL / Right clickRTPowerLeft shift / Left clickX

You can move, and jump, but let me show you specials abilities:

Shrink

Shrink your size to pass in narrow paths. You can also use this ability to jump higher or perform a powerful charge on the ground. With some practice, you can master a fast jump.

Dash

Dash is a limited ability, you have to find a purple orb to pick up this power, and a single touch makes you lose this power. By pressing the power button, you will perform a powerful dash that keeps you in the air or destroy crates.

Invincibility

Just pick up a hidden star, and you will be faster and invincible for 20 seconds!
